## An animated transition {auto-animate="true"}

```{awk}
#| echo: TRUE
#| eval: FALSE
#!/bin/awk -f
BEGIN{srand() }
{ lines[++d]=$0 }
END{
    while (1){
    if (e==d) {break}
        RANDOM = int(1 + rand() * d)
        if ( RANDOM in lines  ){
            print lines[RANDOM]
            delete lines[RANDOM]
            ++e
        }
    }
}
```
